QuestData.Title: Narkrall, the Drake-Tamer
QuestData.Description: $n, the stronghold at Bloodgulch is the heart of the Dragonmaw empire in the Highlands. It is just up the river. Narkrall Rakeclaw is using his considerable power to amass a wing of drake-riders there.$B$BFor the Dragonmaw to succeed, Bloodgulch must succeed. Go to Narkrall and make sure it is so.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Narkrall Rakeclaw at Bloodgulch in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Narkrall Rakeclaw at Bloodgulch in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: <Narkrall sizes you up.>$B$BAnother mewling Horde whelp? Zaela saps our strength by diluting our forces with the weak. Very well, $c. Prove yourself to me, and show me what your Horde is made of.
